text: Saint-Christophe-du-Luat is a former commune of 553 people (1999). It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Mayenne department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the commune of Évron.Arrêté préfectoral 14 November 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Mayenne
title: Saint-Christophe-du-Luat
